name: NS 3780 (Oculus Quest VR)
description:
PROLOGUE

"Humanity has undergone many crises since it came into the world.

Wars, diseases, separation of castes. All this has only made us more and more divided, and in itself has created more hatred and enslavement.

Decades after decades and centuries after centuries, the richest people used their money and power to get everything they wanted. The DarkWeb born in the 2000s had simply become everyone's daily life.

This situation, now called the Rupture, plunged us definitively towards the end of the planet, we needed to reinvented ourself. Created a new era in a new place, with new people wishing not to repeat the mistakes of the past.To achieve their project, they had to design new technologies, recruit new explorers and sometimes even create them.

These new explorers aim to discover new horizons where the rest of Humanity will be able to migrate, and hopefully live in peace."

__________________________________________________

                                        INTRODUCTION

You play as the captain of the NS 3780 explorer brigade during his first missions. Halfway between an action game and an escape game, you will have to juggle with  your armour's skills and your investigation to find a way to get out alive and continue the adventure.

Your armour will evolve from level to level, as will the difficulty of the puzzles and the arrival of the enemies.

For this first chapter "The Awakening", the focus is on the puzzle... The action will come when your armour is slightly more advanced.
